typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcHospitalAdmissions
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code_2_digit as string,
		country_code_3_digit as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceCountryDim
source(output(
		date_key as date,
		date as date,
		year as string,
		month as short,
		day as short,
		day_name as string,
		day_of_year as short,
		week_of_month as short,
		week_of_year as string,
		month_name as string,
		year_month as integer,
		year_week as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> datedim
SrcHospitalAdmissions select(mapColumn(
		country,
		indicator,
		reported_date = date,
		reported_year_week = year_week,
		value,
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredCols
SelectRequiredCols, sourceCountryDim lookup(SelectRequiredCols@country == sourceCountryDim@country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookupcountrydim
Lookupcountrydim select(mapColumn(
		country = SelectRequiredCols@country,
		indicator,
		reported_date,
		reported_year_week,
		value,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectreqirdlookupcols
Selectreqirdlookupcols split(indicator=="Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k" || indicator == "Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k",
	disjoint: false) ~> WeeklyDailySplit@(Weekly, Daily)
datedim aggregate(groupBy(ecdc_year_week = year+'-W'+lpad(week_of_year,2,'0')),
	{week start date} = min(date),
		{week end date} = max(date)) ~> Aggregateforminmaxdate
WeeklyDailySplit@Weekly, Aggregateforminmaxdate join(reported_year_week == ecdc_year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joinreportedweekdate
WeeklyDailySplit@Daily pivot(groupBy(country,
		reported_date,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Daily hospital occupancy', 'Daily hospital ICU occupancy']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> DailyPivot
Joinreportedweekdate pivot(groupBy(country,
		reported_year_week,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		ecdc_year_week,
		population,
		{week start date},
		{week end date}),
	pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
	count = sum(value),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivotweekly
Pivotweekly sort(desc(reported_year_week, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> Sortcols1
DailyPivot sort(desc(reported_date, true),
	asc(country, true)) ~> Sortcols2
Sortcols1 select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_year_week,
		reported_week_start_date = {week start date},
		reported_week_end_date = {week end date},
		new_hospital_occupancy_count = {Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_count},
		new_icu_occupancy_count = {Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_count},
		source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectoutputcols1
Sortcols2 select(mapColumn(
		country,
		reported_date,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		{Daily hospital occupancy_count},
		{Daily hospital ICU occupancy_count}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectoutputcols2
Selectoutputcols1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['weekly.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		reported_year_week,
		source,
		ecdc_year_week,
		{Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k_count} = new_hospital_occupancy_count,
		{Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k_count}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeeklySink
Selectoutputcols2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['daily.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		country,
		reported_date,
		source,
		country_code_2_digit,
		country_code_3_digit,
		population,
		{Daily hospital occupancy_count},
		{Daily hospital ICU occupancy_count}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dailysink
